title.narrative: It Takes a Community (Communication Campaign on behalf of the GFMD Working Group on Public Narratives on Migration)

description.narrative: Public attitudes towards migrants and migration remain deeply polarized on a global scale, fueled in part through the spread of misinformation. The emergence of COVID-19 has exacerbated this challenge, sparking a troubling rise in discrimination and xenophobia towards migrants and refugees. “It Takes a Community” is an unbranded, bottom-up campaign that aims to showcase nuanced and diverse perspectives about how migration enriches our lives. This global movement is built on sharing inspiring and genuine stories online about the many ways in which people, organizations, businesses and governments are building inclusive and welcoming communities for the benefit of all. Envisioned as a global campaign with local impacts, the campaign’s objectives are to push back against misinformation and harmful narratives about migration, foster a more balanced public discourse and support efforts to improve social cohesion to work together for better outcomes. The decentralized, flexible structure of the campaign allows participants to share stories about how migration has enriched their lives, their communities and businesses.
